mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.USER_NO , M.MBTI_NICK , TO_CHAR(B.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "B.ENROLL_DATE" , BI.ORIGIN_NAME , BI.CHANGE_NAME FROM BOARD B, BOARDIMG BI, MEMBER M WHERE B.BOARD_NO = BI.BOARD_NO (+) AND B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO (+) AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BI.THUMBNAIL = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT ROWNUM, B.* FROM (SELECT BO.BOARD_NO , BO.BOARD_TITLE , BO.USER_NO , M.MBTI_NICK , TO_CHAR(BO.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "BO.ENROLL_DATE" , BI.ORIGIN_NAME , BI.CHANGE_NAME FROM BOARD BO, BOARDIMG BI, MEMBER M WHERE BO.BOARD_NO = BI.BOARD_NO (+) AND BO.USER_NO = M.USER_NO (+) AND BO.STATUS = 'Y' AND BI.THUMBNAIL = 'Y' ORDER BY VIEWS DESC) B WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , USER_NO , BOARD_CONTENT) VALUES(BNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{boardTitle} , #{userNo} , #{boardContent})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET VIEWS = VIEWS + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_CONTENT , B.VIEWS , TO_CHAR(B.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "ENROLL_DATE" , TO_CHAR(B.MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "MODIFY_DATE" , B.STATUS , B.USER_NO , B.MATCH_NO , M.MBTI_NICK FROM BOARD B, MEMBER M WHERE B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO (+) AND B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT IMG_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , THUMBNAIL , BOARD_NO FROM BOARDIMG WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B, MEMBER M WHERE B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND ${condition} LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.USER_NO , M.MBTI_NICK , TO_CHAR(B.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "B.ENROLL_DATE" , BI.ORIGIN_NAME , BI.CHANGE_NAME FROM BOARD B, BOARDIMG BI, MEMBER M WHERE B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO (+) AND B.BOARD_NO = BI.BOARD_NO (+) AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BI.THUMBNAIL = 'Y' AND ${condition} LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
